title: Black loading screen
body: Hey, so this NEVER happens to me, i do lobby and all that, but when i go into game its just a black screen for the loading, so i restart client and all, and it just stays black, i restart everything, log back in and now i have 5 20 min bans, like are you fukn serious. you guys cant get you're report system right, for a multi-million dollar company you would think they would be able to imply something that can tell the difference weather you are leaving the game or their game is not letting you play.
